repnme.cdata!:
Iraq - Dokan and Derbandikhan Emergency
            Hydro Power Project : restructuring

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Dokan
            and Derbandikhan Emergency Hydro Power Project is to: 1)
            help alleviate the current power supply shortfall in the
            Kurdish region through urgent repair work; 2) strengthen the
            capacity of local operational staff; and 3) prepare for the
            subsequent rehabilitation of the Dokan and Derbandikhan
            hydropower plants. The changes include in this restructuring
            paper are: the extension of the project closing date, and
            revision of the results framework indicators. First, the
            closing date for the project is requested to be extended
            from September 30, 2012 until December 31, 2013. The
            15-month extension to the project closing date is necessary
            to complete a single contract under one of the project
            components: the repair of Derbandikhan switchyard. The
            second change includes modifications to the results
            framework indicators. The Project's Development
            Objectives (PDOs) remain unchanged; however the results
            framework indicators (PDO-level and intermediate) are to be
            changed to better measure progress towards achieving the
            PDOs and the intermediate results necessary to meet these.

display_title.display_title:
Iraq - Dokan and Derbandikhan
            Emergency Hydro Power Project : restructuring : Main report
